channel.title: [317] TheBestScape [PI]
channel.description:
[center]-----[u][b]Introduction[/b][/u]-----[/center] I started this server from the source IntDubPk, i am currently the only coder coding this server. I have changed alot and added new things.
[center]-----[u][b]Things I Have Changed/Added[/b][/u]-----[/center]
[center]I Have Changed ModIcons[/center] [center]I Have Added New Rights With Added InGame Icons[/center] [center]Have ReMade Barrows[/center] [center]Cash Exchange, No Limit With Your Cash[/center] [center]I Have Added Christmas Crakers, Fully Working[/center] [center]Custom Home[/center] [center]Added Custom Monster[/center] [center]Have Added Custom Staff Zone[/center] [center]Have Added Custom Whips[/center] [center]Have Added Desert, Jungle and Ice Strykewyrms[/center] [center]Have Added Donator Points And Chest[/center] [center]Have Added Three MiniGames:-[/center] [center]DragonPoint Minigame[/center] [center]Monster KIll Minigame[/center] [center]Reward Minigame[/center] [center]Have Added Full Torva[/center] [center]Have Added Full Primal[/center] [center]Added Login Interface (Made By Me)[/center] [center]Added Staff Login Messages[/center] [center]Added Lottery[/center] [center]Have Added Packyak For Super Donators[/center] [center]Added Terror Bird For Donators[/center] [center]Customized Vote Shop Interface (Made By Me)[/center] [center]Added Vote Tickets[/center] [center]Have Moved Skilling Area (Move To Fishing Guild) [/center] [center]Have Added Reward Interface[/center] [center]Have Added Player Owned Shops[/center] [center]have Fixed Alching (Could Only Alch In One Spot)[/center] [center]Have Fixed Many Other Things[/center] [center]Edited Client All Round[/center] [center]Added New Items (E.g Donator Cape/Super Donator Cape[/center] [center]I Have Added New Commands[/center] [center]I Have Added Pking Points, Slayer Points[/center] [center]Donator points, Dragon Points, Barrows Points[/center] [center]Have Edited Slayer Tasks[/center]
[center]-----[u][b]Requesting Web Developer[/b][/u]-----[/center]
[center]I am in need of a web developer to create a decent website for the server, you will need past experience of making a website and know HTML ect.[/center]
[center]-----[u][b]Pictures![/b][/u]-----[/center]
[center][img]http://i1123.photobucket.com/albums/l556/rhys54321/AssistIcon.jpg[/img][/center]
[center][img]http://i1123.photobucket.com/albums/l556/rhys54321/BarrowsShop.jpg[/img][/center]

item.title: [317] TheBestScape [PI]
item.dc:creator: @liamp liamp
item.description:
@liamp wrote:

[quote=“rhys132, post:21, topic:426452”][quote author=kill you704 link=topic=529149.msg3868230#msg3868230 date=1325142198]
Can I apply for server developer? I really enjoy your way of customizing this PI. Something I have never seen before and I would like to be apart. Please.
[/quote]
i just need someone to help me make a website, im going to put my server on hold and maybe learn how to make websites myself[/quote]

don’t do that just ask for a website developer to join your team

Read full topic

item.title: [317] TheBestScape [PI]
item.dc:creator: @rhys132 rhys132
item.description:
@rhys132 wrote:

Team_Rocket:

You could make NPCs at Home walk and change their facing direction if they’re stationary. That would be a good move to make it seem less crowded. Good luck with this.

they do face different directions

also i didnt think of the name it was a friend

Read full topic

item.title: [317] TheBestScape [PI]
item.dc:creator: @rhys132 rhys132
item.description:
@rhys132 wrote:

runewings317:

Some of the interfaces are ok, but the home looks a little sloppy… I would spread it out and have some NPCs walking around in the middle and not have everything against the wall. But I love what you did with the Stryke Worms. That’s pretty neat Good luck!

cheers and thanx for feedback

i did have them walking around but they get in the way lol

Read full topic

item.description:

item.title: [317] TheBestScape [PI]
item.dc:creator: @rhys132 rhys132
item.description:
@rhys132 wrote:

[center]-----Introduction-----[/center]
I started this server from the source IntDubPk, i am currently the only coder coding this server.
I have changed alot and added new things.

[center]-----Things I Have Changed/Added-----[/center]

[center]I Have Changed ModIcons[/center]
[center]I Have Added New Rights With Added InGame Icons[/center]
[center]Have ReMade Barrows[/center]
[center]Cash Exchange, No Limit With Your Cash[/center]
[center]I Have Added Christmas Crakers, Fully Working[/center]
[center]Custom Home[/center]
[center]Added Custom Monster[/center]
[center]Have Added Custom Staff Zone[/center]
[center]Have Added Custom Whips[/center]
[center]Have Added Desert, Jungle and Ice Strykewyrms[/center]
[center]Have Added Donator Points And Chest[/center]
[center]Have Added Three MiniGames:-[/center]
[center]DragonPoint Minigame[/center]
[center]Monster KIll Minigame[/center]
[center]Reward Minigame[/center]
[center]Have Added Full Torva[/center]
[center]Have Added Full Primal[/center]
[center]Added Login Interface (Made By Me)[/center]
[center]Added Staff Login Messages[/center]
[center]Added Lottery[/center]
[center]Have Added Packyak For Super Donators[/center]
[center]Added Terror Bird For Donators[/center]
[center]Customized Vote Shop Interface (Made By Me)[/center]
[center]Added Vote Tickets[/center]
[center]Have Moved Skilling Area (Move To Fishing Guild) [/center]
[center]Have Added Reward Interface[/center]
[center]Have Added Player Owned Shops[/center]
[center]have Fixed Alching (Could Only Alch In One Spot)[/center]
[center]Have Fixed Many Other Things[/center]
[center]Edited Client All Round[/center]
[center]Added New Items (E.g Donator Cape/Super Donator Cape[/center]
[center]I Have Added New Commands[/center]
[center]I Have Added Pking Points, Slayer Points[/center]
[center]Donator points, Dragon Points, Barrows Points[/center]
[center]Have Edited Slayer Tasks[/center]

[center]-----Requesting Web Developer-----[/center]

[center]I am in need of a web developer to create a decent website for the server, you will need past experience of making a website and know HTML ect.[/center]

[center]-----Pictures!-----[/center]
